name: WordPress Backup & Migration
author: WebToffee

sections.description:
Simple, Easy-to-use WordPress Migration Plugin

This WordPress migrator plugin lets you migrate your WordPress site between any hosts or domains. You can backup your WordPress site automatically or manually on a single click and restore it to the target site with zero downtime.

You can backup to cloud (Amazon S3, Google Drive) and external storage locations FTP, SFTP. Other than full site backups, the plugin supports database backups, and lets you migrate only the selected files.

WordPress Migrator & Backup Plugin – free version features

🔸 Ease of use: Migrate all your WordPress data (media files, plugins, themes, and database) with minimal clicks.

🔸 One-click backup and restore: Supports single-click backup and restore.

🔸 No data size limit for migration: Backup and restore WordPress site’s of any size effortlessly.

🔸 Supports all hosts or operating system: There is no limitation on host and operating system for migration.

🔸 Automated scheduled backups: Schedule backups on a daily/weekly/monthly basis.

🔸 Auto-replace website URLs: Supports auto-replace of URLs during restore. No longer need for search and replace!

🔸 Multiple backup locations: Supports FTP/SFTP, Google Drive, Amazon S3, and local storage.

🔸 Backup and migrate only selected data: You can choose what you need to migrate from your WordPress site. Supports database backup, backup of chosen files (plugins, themes, core files, uploads, etc.)

🔸 Supports both MySQL and MySQLi

Setup Guide – WordPress Migration & Backup

You can checkout the user guide to easily setup the plugin or watch the below video.

Premium version features

✅ Scheduled automatic backups at custom intervals
✅ Supports DropBox and OneDrive
✅ Select database tables to backup
✅ Select files to backup
✅ Supports multiple formats (ZIP, GZIP, and TAR)
✅ Multiple storage locations
✅ Email notifications for site’s backup status

Read more about the pro version of the plugin by checking out its product page.

DIFFERENT WORDPRESS MIGRATION CASES THAT CAN BE HANDLED WITH THE PLUGIN

Following are some of the common use cases you can handle using this plugin.

  • Move WordPress site to a new domain
  • Transfer your WordPress site from your current host to a new one
  • Copy your WordPress site from one domain to another
  • Move WordPress from localhost to server
  • Move your WordPress site from its subdomain to its root domain
  • You need a WordPress clone of the live site for testing or development purposes
  • You are creating a manual backup of a WordPress website
  • You need to restore WordPress after the site crashed
  • You need to do a WordPress restore to an earlier version

HOW WORDPRESS BACKUP AND MIGRATOR PLUGIN WORKS

Migrating a WordPress site to anew domain or host consists of three parts – moving the files, moving the database, and reconfiguring (if needed). Our WordPress migration plugin automates this process.

You may follow the below steps for a WordPress full migration.

  • Install the WordPress Backup & Migration plugin on your existing website.
  • Generate(export) a migration file that includes all the files required as a zip file.
  • Install WordPress Backup & Migration plugin on the target site.
  • Import the zip file into your new location. The plugin will move all files including theme files, plugin files, and replace the database.
  • You will be logged out forcefully once the WP migration and restore is completed.
sections.installation:
WordPress Backup & Migration can be installed directly through your WordPress Plugins dashboard.

  1. Click “Add New” and search for “WordPress Backup & Migration”
  2. Install and Activate

WordPress Backup & Migration also can be installed by manually uploading the zip file of the plugin via FTP.

  1. Download the zip file of the plugin from the WordPress plugin repository
  2. Unzip the downloaded zip file
  3. Upload the plugin folder into the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory of your WordPress site
  4. Go the ‘Installed Plugins’ page on the WordPress dashboard. Activate WordPress Backup & Migration from the Plugins page

After the installation and activation of the plugin, the plugin menu will appear on the WordPress sidebar.
sections.faq:
Does the plugin support multisite?

The plugin is capable of exporting and importing WordPress multisite.

How to increase maximum upload file size while migrating with the plugin?

You can refer to this article for learning how to increase the maximum file upload size during migration.

Does the plugin support all sizes of sites for migration?

Yes. With the WordPress Backup and Migration plugin you can backup and migrate WordPress sites of all sizes.

Does it work with all hosts?

Yes. You can migrate your WordPress site between any hosts with the plugin.

sections.reviews:
Quite good

By tinnfinn on December 23, 2023

Omitting some features / formats during migration, which must be transferred manually.

Totally awesome, you need only this

By dean_l on August 29, 2023

I gone through several plugin for migation and all were complicated and limited in features. This one was the ONLY AWESEOM one! Seriously. Simple, quick, worked like charm, no bs. This is THE one you need for migration or backup. Great job, thanks Webtoffee!

Super simple

By dougnz55 on August 21, 2023

And that's just me. No but seriously, it was really really easy to save the site (from localhost) and export it. Everything worked first time. Well done.

I tried a couple of others before this, and they were either difficult to start or restrictive in the file size.

Fantastic !!!

By danicdanic on August 10, 2023

I have tried All in one WP Migration, I have tried Duplicator. Conclusion :: WordPress Backup & Migration is by far the best. Incrediby easy to use, incredibly efficient. HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

best plugin

By revuecercle on July 7, 2023

vraiment un outil très performant et pratique

Didn't work for me

By lessharkboy on June 29, 2023

I tried this plugin and followed the easy instructions, however it didn't work for me and caused a wordpress critical error. I couldn't then check the logs so had to reset my site.

Very convenient

By eugene212 on June 27, 2023

Thanks for such a useful plugin !
It's really easy to create site backups and migrate them to a different server.
N.B. I have found that the best migration approach is to do it on a fresh WP installation - so far this way worked for me all the time.

Very useful

By mamomimatata on March 18, 2023

Simply, quick, good working :-)
Helped me to move easily my few websites.

Great Migration Plugin

By Md Billal Hossain (probillals) on February 6, 2023

Really good plugin for migrating a website. Worked very easily.

It simply works!

By romusicprog on September 14, 2022

Great plugin: Recommended ;)

short_description: Easily backup, restore, or migrate. Supports one-click backup and scheduled backup. Backup selected content to Amazon S3, Google Drive, FTP/SFTP, etc.
